title: 旧约 - 出埃及记(Exodus) - 第 25 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 出埃及记(Exodus) -- 第 25 章 ( 本篇共有 40 章 )

lineList.en: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
lineList.cn: 耶和华晓谕摩西说，

lineList.en: Speak unto the children of Israel, that they bring me an offering: of every man that giveth it willingly with his heart ye shall take my offering.
lineList.cn: 你告诉以色列人当为我送礼物来，凡甘心乐意的，你们就可以收下归我。

lineList.en: And this is the offering which ye shall take of them; gold, and silver, and brass,
lineList.cn: 所要收的礼物，就是金，银，铜，

lineList.en: And blue, and purple, and scarlet, and fine linen, and goats' hair,
lineList.cn: 蓝色，紫色，朱红色线，细麻，山羊毛，

lineList.en: And rams' skins dyed red, and badgers' skins, and shittim wood,
lineList.cn: 染红的公羊皮，海狗皮，皂荚木，

lineList.en: Oil for the light, spices for anointing oil, and for sweet incense,
lineList.cn: 点灯的油并作膏油和香的香料，

lineList.en: Onyx stones, and stones to be set in the ephod, and in the breastplate.
lineList.cn: 红玛瑙与别样的宝石，可以镶嵌在以弗得和胸牌上。

lineList.en: And let them make me a sanctuary; that I may dwell among them.
lineList.cn: 又当为我造圣所，使我可以住在他们中间。

lineList.en: According to all that I shew thee, after the pattern of the tabernacle, and the pattern of all the instruments thereof, even so shall ye make it.
lineList.cn: 制造帐幕和其中的一切器具都要照我所指示你的样式。

lineList.en: And they shall make an ark of shittim wood: two cubits and a half shall be the length thereof, and a cubit and a half the breadth thereof, and a cubit and a half the height thereof.
lineList.cn: 要用皂荚木作一柜，长二肘半，宽一肘半，高一肘半。

lineList.en: And thou shalt overlay it with pure gold, within and without shalt thou overlay it, and shalt make upon it a crown of gold round about.
lineList.cn: 要里外包上精金，四围镶上金牙边。

lineList.en: And thou shalt cast four rings of gold for it, and put them in the four corners thereof; and two rings shall be in the one side of it, and two rings in the other side of it.
lineList.cn: 也要铸四个金环，安在柜的四脚上，这边两环，那边两环。

lineList.en: And thou shalt make staves of shittim wood, and overlay them with gold.
lineList.cn: 要用皂荚木作两根杠，用金包裹。

lineList.en: And thou shalt put the staves into the rings by the sides of the ark, that the ark may be borne with them.
lineList.cn: 要把杠穿在柜旁的环内，以便抬柜。

lineList.en: The staves shall be in the rings of the ark: they shall not be taken from it.
lineList.cn: 这杠要常在柜的环内，不可抽出来。

lineList.en: And thou shalt put into the ark the testimony which I shall give thee.
lineList.cn: 必将我所要赐给你的法版放在柜里。

lineList.en: And thou shalt make a mercy seat of pure gold: two cubits and a half shall be the length thereof, and a cubit and a half the breadth thereof.
lineList.cn: 要用精金作施恩座（施恩或作蔽罪下同），长二肘半，宽一肘半。

lineList.en: And thou shalt make two cherubims of gold, of beaten work shalt thou make them, in the two ends of the mercy seat.
lineList.cn: 要用金子锤出两个基路伯来，安在施恩座的两头。

lineList.en: And make one cherub on the one end, and the other cherub on the other end: even of the mercy seat shall ye make the cherubims on the two ends thereof.
lineList.cn: 这头作一个基路伯，那头作一个基路伯，二基路伯要接连一块，在施恩座的两头。

lineList.en: And the cherubims shall stretch forth their wings on high, covering the mercy seat with their wings, and their faces shall look one to another; toward the mercy seat shall the faces of the cherubims be.
lineList.cn: 二基路伯要高张翅膀，遮掩施恩座。基路伯要脸对脸，朝着施恩座。

lineList.en: And thou shalt put the mercy seat above upon the ark; and in the ark thou shalt put the testimony that I shall give thee.
lineList.cn: 要将施恩座安在柜的上边，又将我所要赐给你的法版放在柜里。

lineList.en: And there I will meet with thee, and I will commune with thee from above the mercy seat, from between the two cherubims which are upon the ark of the testimony, of all things which I will give thee in commandment unto the children of Israel.
lineList.cn: 我要在那里与你相会，又要从法柜施恩座上二基路伯中间，和你说我所要吩咐你传给以色列人的一切事。

lineList.en: Thou shalt also make a table of shittim wood: two cubits shall be the length thereof, and a cubit the breadth thereof, and a cubit and a half the height thereof.
lineList.cn: 要用皂荚木作一张桌子，长二肘，宽一肘，高一肘半。

lineList.en: And thou shalt overlay it with pure gold, and make thereto a crown of gold round about.
lineList.cn: 要包上精金，四围镶上金牙边。

lineList.en: And thou shalt make unto it a border of an hand breadth round about, and thou shalt make a golden crown to the border thereof round about.
lineList.cn: 桌子的四围各作一掌宽的横梁，横梁上镶着金牙边。

lineList.en: And thou shalt make for it four rings of gold, and put the rings in the four corners that are on the four feet thereof.
lineList.cn: 要作四个金环，安在桌子的四角上，就是桌子四脚上的四角。

lineList.en: Over against the border shall the rings be for places of the staves to bear the table.
lineList.cn: 安环子的地方要挨近横梁，可以穿杠抬桌子。

lineList.en: And thou shalt make the staves of shittim wood, and overlay them with gold, that the table may be borne with them.
lineList.cn: 要用皂荚木作两根杠，用金包裹，以便抬桌子。

lineList.en: And thou shalt make the dishes thereof, and spoons thereof, and covers thereof, and bowls thereof, to cover withal: of pure gold shalt thou make them.
lineList.cn: 要作桌子上的盘子，调羹，并奠酒的爵和瓶，这都要用精金制作。

lineList.en: And thou shalt set upon the table shewbread before me alway.
lineList.cn: 又要在桌子上，在我面前，常摆陈设饼。

lineList.en: And thou shalt make a candlestick of pure gold: of beaten work shall the candlestick be made: his shaft, and his branches, his bowls, his knops, and his flowers, shall be of the same.
lineList.cn: 要用精金作一个灯台。灯台的座和干与杯，球，花，都要接连一块锤出来。

lineList.en: And six branches shall come out of the sides of it; three branches of the candlestick out of the one side, and three branches of the candlestick out of the other side:
lineList.cn: 灯台两旁要杈出六个枝子，这旁三个，那旁三个。

lineList.en: Three bowls made like unto almonds, with a knop and a flower in one branch; and three bowls made like almonds in the other branch, with a knop and a flower: so in the six branches that come out of the candlestick.
lineList.cn: 这旁每枝上有三个杯，形状像杏花，有球，有花，那旁每枝上也有三个杯，形状像杏花，有球，有花。从灯台杈出来的六个枝子都是如此。

lineList.en: And in the candlestick shall be four bowls made like unto almonds, with their knops and their flowers.
lineList.cn: 灯台上有四个杯，形状像杏花，有球，有花。

lineList.en: And there shall be a knop under two branches of the same, and a knop under two branches of the same, and a knop under two branches of the same, according to the six branches that proceed out of the candlestick.
lineList.cn: 灯台每两个枝子以下有球与枝子接连一块。灯台出的六个枝子都是如此。

lineList.en: Their knops and their branches shall be of the same: all it shall be one beaten work of pure gold.
lineList.cn: 球和枝子要接连一块，都是一块精金锤出来的。

lineList.en: And thou shalt make the seven lamps thereof: and they shall light the lamps thereof, that they may give light over against it.
lineList.cn: 要作灯台的七个灯盏。祭司要点这灯，使灯光对照。

lineList.en: And the tongs thereof, and the snuffdishes thereof, shall be of pure gold.
lineList.cn: 灯台的腊剪和腊花盘也是要精金的。

lineList.en: Of a talent of pure gold shall he make it, with all these vessels.
lineList.cn: 作灯台和这一切的器具要用精金一他连得。

lineList.en: And look that thou make them after their pattern, which was shewed thee in the mount.
lineList.cn: 要谨慎作这些物件，都要照着在山上指示你的样式。
